QuestData.Title: Dwarven Artifacts
QuestData.Description: $n, my $g boy: beautiful flower;! Are you into archaeology?$b$bWe've an exciting opportunity right outside our front door. All the shaking from today's seismic event has knocked a number of artifacts loose from the soil around our encampment. Survey along the valley's northern border, and you should find all sorts of treasures. Bring some back to me, and perhaps we can study them together.$b$bRight, then! Off you go!
QuestData.RewardText: Wonderful! Look at this one... it must be over 200 years old!$b$bNow, onto other matters...
